akas: Mi vida con 300 kilos Spain (dubbed version)
akas from release info: Mi vida con 300 kilos Spain (dubbed version)

1.title: Octavia's Story
1.plot: Octavia has been bedbound for nearly a year when she decides to make the trip to Houston to get help from Dr. Now, but when it turns out that her best friend is also her worst enabler, Octavia will have to choose between old habits and a new life.

2.title: Brianne's Story
2.plot: At over 700 pounds, Brianne undertakes a weight-loss journey to save her own life and faces an unexpected challenge to her fragile progress when her husband suffers a heart attack on a birthday she will never forget.

3.title: Robin's Story
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Justin's Story
4.plot: A college graduate with a once-promising career, Justin has eaten his life away to the point of never leaving the house for anything but food. Now only the help of Dr. Now's weight-loss program can restore his hopes of living a happy, productive life.

5.title: Holly's Story
5.plot: Holly already has one failed weight loss surgery, so to succeed this time, she must do more than change her eating habits, she must address the childhood issues that continue to plague her.

6.title: Lacey's Story
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Brandon's Story
7.plot: Brandon is a talented musician with a beautiful voice and a run-away weight problem. He wants more than to lose weight, he wants a career and he wants to take the next step with his girlfriend Taylor whom he risks losing if he can't make a change.

1.title: Melissa's Story
1.plot: 650-lb Melissa begins her seven-year weight loss journey.

2.title: Melissa's Story Part 2
2.plot: 650-lb Melissa struggles to get to her ideal weight.

3.title: Donald's Story
3.plot: Love motivates 660-lb Donald to begin his weight loss journey.

4.title: Henry's Story
4.plot: 750-lb Henry begins his weight loss journey in the hopes of transforming himself in time to attend his high school reunion.

5.title: Ashley's Story
5.plot: Ashley's career was derailed after she was let go due to her excessive weight. Will she be able to turn her life around and achieve her goal of owning a childcare facility?

6.title: Where Are They Now?
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Zsalynn's Story
1.plot: Zsaylnn, once known as the "Fat Girl Rock Star" - married a man who loves large women. Now weighing over 600lbs, she urgently needs to lose weight to be the mother her daughter deserves. Can Zsalynn succeed with a husband who doesn't support her goals?

2.title: Olivia's Story
2.plot: Battling severe depression in the wake of a suicide attempt, 46-year old Olivia hasn't left her Chicago basement in two years. With one last chance at a new life, Olivia will travel to Houston with the hope of having a life-changing surgery.

3.title: Penny's Story
3.plot: Bedridden for four years, 46-year old Penny knows that her weight may kill her if drastic actions aren't taken. Penny moves from Maryland to Texas, to have gastric bypass - but her unwillingness to make real lifestyle changes could be her downfall.

4.title: Chuck's Story
4.plot: Chuck weighs almost 700lbs and it has hindered every aspect of his life. He's had to downsize his business and his wife feels like a single-parent, who is ready to leave him. Can Chuck take control and reclaim the life that's slipping through his fingers?

5.title: Christina's Story
5.plot: Christina is a 22-year old married woman from South Haven, Mississippi, who hasn't left her house in two years due to her size. Her doting family has enabled her and she's eaten herself into a state that will soon kill her, if she can't make a change.

6.title: Paula's Story
6.plot: Paula has had a tough life, and at over 600lbs, has built a physical wall around herself to push people away. When she suddenly loses someone she loves, Paula can no longer ignore the threat of losing her own life - especially for her children's sake.

7.title: James' Story
7.plot: James comes from a long line of family obesity and at 706lbs, is determined not to die in the same hospital bed that his father and sister did. James vows to change his lifestyle in order to get gastric bypass, and even has hopes of dating again.

8.title: Tara's Story
8.plot: Tara is a mother of two from Lafayette, LA. Addicted to food, she is too ashamed of her size to be seen with her kids, confining herself indoors. Now seeking gastric bypass, Tara is committed to regaining her confidence and being a proud mother once more.

1.title: Zsalynn and Christina
1.plot: Zsalynn is finally free of Gareth, her ex-husband who wouldn't let her lose weight; Christina faces a difficult challenge when she passes out at home.

2.title: Olivia and James
2.plot: Olivia strives to weigh-in under 200-lbs as she lives by herself for the first time and suffers an unexpected loss. Battling a series of let downs, James fights to reach his goal of skin surgery and to live a fulfilling relationship for the first time.

3.title: Penny and Tara
3.plot: Away from Dr. Nowzaradan's care, Penny has returned to Maryland believing she can make the right choices to lose weight, but has she truly changed? Dating for the first time in her life, Tara continues to lose weight and is learning to balance new roles.

4.title: Chuck and Paula
4.plot: Chuck starts from scratch during his second year of weight-loss, discovering a promising new relationship. Paula juggles many responsibilities head at once, but is it too much to stay on track for her weight-loss goal?

5.title: Amber's Story
5.plot: At age 23, and over 600-lbs, Amber relies on her family, and boyfriend for even simple needs. Her fear of dying young is so overwhelming that she makes the decision to relocate 2,000 miles in hopes that weight loss surgery will give her life back.

6.title: Susan's Story
6.plot: Weighing in at over 600-lbs, 37 year old Susan is committed to drastic weight loss. But, when an unforeseen medical disorder strikes her mobility, finding the strength to make it through these obstacles is a matter of life and death.

7.title: Pauline's Story
7.plot: At nearly 700 lbs., 51-year-old Pauline has an addiction to food that is killing her and taken over the life of her son, who is the primary caretaker. Can she overcome this addiction to change her lifestyle and save both their lives?

8.title: Bettie Jo's Story
8.plot: At just 24, Bettie Jo is eating her way towards 700-lbs. Housebound, she is reliant on her husband for even basic needs. Bettie Jo's future relies on her losing weight, and her husband losing his fear that if she loses weight, she will leave him.

9.title: Angel's Story
9.plot: At 42 years old, Angel is staring death in the face. She is struggling to make a positive change and be an active part of her partner and son's lives. With so much at stake, can she turn her life around?

10.title: Joe's Story
10.plot: Joe is only 30, and trapped in an 800-lb body. He lost his job and is mostly housebound. Can Joe find the strength to face his past and save his life?

11.title: Laura's Story
11.plot: Laura has used food to cope with her emotions for too long. Confined to a wheelchair, relying on an oxygen tank to breathe, she depends upon her husband and mother to survive. Love for her family must conquer her demons if she is to turn her life around.

12.title: Charity's Story
12.plot: Charity weighs nearly 800-lbs. Suffering from flesh-eating bacteria and butterfly shaped fat deposits; she is unable to function without help form her family. When unexpected bad news threatens her weight loss journey, she must decide if she can continue.

13.title: Chay's Story
13.plot: Chay is just 23, but to cope with the emotional turmoil of his childhood he has eaten his way to 600-lbs and it's threatening to kill him before turning 30. When Chay loses his emotional support, he must find new strength to take control of his life.

14.title: Marla's Story
14.plot: Marla is so heavy she cannot stand up. Bedridden, her true weight is unknown but estimated at 800-lbs. Marla must face the facts about her health and the toll it takes on her supportive family if she is to save her health.

1.title: Nikki's Story
1.plot: Pivotal moments, whether tragic breaking points or ultimate triumphs, decide the success or failure of individuals struggling with extreme obesity. They must face the reality that weight-loss surgery alone is not the answer to reclaiming their lives.

2.title: Brittani's Story
2.plot: At over 600 pounds, Brittani's eating has enslaved her and left her marriage without intimacy. She must seek help before her body gives out.

3.title: Chad's Story
3.plot: At 700 pounds, Chad's weight is dangerously out of control. After gastric bypass surgery, he quickly sheds pounds but faces a medical crisis when he does not follow the doctor's orders. In dire straits, Chad puts his weight loss journey on the line.

4.title: June's Story
4.plot: 600-pound June copes with the tragic death of her son by eating. After gastric bypass surgery, she must confront the emotional issues driving her food compulsion. If she can stay on track, she can become the mother she desperately wants to be.

5.title: Dottie's Story
5.plot: Dottie loves being a mom but, at over 600lbs, she's on the verge of leaving her 2 young children motherless. She agrees to a drastic new diet, but her child's life-threatening emergency & her own self-sabotage threaten to derail all hopes for weight-loss.

6.title: Gideon's Story
6.plot: At 650 pounds, Gideon's weight prohibits him from working, making him completely dependent on his exhausted wife. Desperate for change, he uproots his family to restart his life with weight-loss surgery and hopes for a future of happily-ever-after.

7.title: Ashley D.'s Story
7.plot: Weighing over 700 pounds at 26 years old, the clock is ticking on Ashley's life. Ashamed of her body, surgery offers hope, but not without setbacks.

8.title: Teretha's Story
8.plot: At over 700lbs, Teretha's life is confined to a bed which is a far cry from her former job representing Detroit's healthy eating program. Her adoring family fears losing her and hopes a gastric bypass will provide the solution she needs to save her life.

9.title: Randy's Story
9.plot: At 650lbs, Randy's food addiction led to the loss of his marriage and visits with his daughter. To regain control of his life, he endures a rigorous pre-surgery diet, surrounded by fast-food temptations. Will he be approved for a weight-loss operation?

10.title: Milla's Story
10.plot: At 700lbs, Milla is bedridden and dependent on her husband and five kids. Terrified each day will be her last, they still can't resist her unending requests for junk food. Can Milla stop a lifetime of unhealthy eating to qualify for gastric surgery?

11.title: Sean's Story
11.plot: 26-year-old Sean weighs over 700-lbs with a massive growth protruding from his side and skin so stretched it is tearing apart. His mother is forced to change both of their lifestyles before he can be approved for gastric bypass surgery.

12.title: Lupe's Story
12.plot: At 600 pounds, Lupe spent the last 10 years in bed & totally dependent on her husband. A doctor in Texas is her only hope for change. A cross-country move to save her life, may end up backfiring. Did Lupe wait too long to begin her weight-loss journey?

13.title: Melissa and Ashley
13.plot: Melissa finds herself overwhelmed with four children, a marriage on the rocks, and an unexpected pregnancy. When Ashley's weight loss journey hits a wall, she sets out to find new inspiration to get herself back on track towards a healthy lifestyle.

14.title: Christina and Paula
14.plot: Christina's weight loss has gone too far, too fast, and now threatens her life. After losing 300lbs, Paula must endure more surgery to deal with a body entirely covered in loose and sagging excess skin.

15.title: Zsalynn and Olivia
15.plot: Zsalynn is excited for a fresh start but her 360-body lift at a Beverly Hills clinic proves more challenging than expected. Lonely and depressed since her gastric surgery, Olivia wants skin removal surgery but struggles to lose the weight to qualify.

16.title: Bettie Jo and Susan
16.plot: Bettie Jo battles depression and a cancer diagnosis and when she finds out she's pregnant, she and her husband must find a way to cope. Susan suffers a major setback after surgery for her excess skin, thwarting her hopes to conquer her obesity.

17.title: Joe
17.plot: Joe has come a long way from being morbidly obese... He's in love and is contemplating proposing to his girlfriend. Charity must find the strength to return to her goals of getting healthy and living a normal life after many post surgery complications.

18.title: Angel and Charity
18.plot: Despite having lost 378 pounds, Angel's crippling knee pain combined with a legacy of extreme obesity threatens everything she's worked for.

19.title: Laura and Marla
19.plot: Laura has lost 300lbs+ and is much less dependent on her husband Joey who now he's having trouble finding his way in the relationship. Marla, one of Dr. Now's most challenging patients returns and the fireworks begin all over again.

20.title: Chay and Pauline
20.plot: Pauline must find the will to keep up her weight-loss progress after a medical emergency. Chaye's finally admitting what he's long known, that he's a transgender woman. However, the emotional stress of coming out could threaten his weight loss journey.

1.title: Brandi and Kandi's Story
1.plot: Twins Kandi & Brandi have a combined weight totaling over 1100lbs. These inseparable twins fear losing each other to obesity, so they make a change together. But a life-threatening event during weight loss surgery recovery may separate them forever.

2.title: Ashley R's Story
2.plot: At 670 pounds Ashley must live in her parents' home with her husband. Desperate to save her life and her marriage, she decides it's time for a drastic change. Can weight loss surgery save her life & give her the chance to have a family of her own?

3.title: Cynthia's Story
3.plot: Cynthia is a 610-lb single mother raising five kids. She's been focused on her children, but now realizes what her death would mean for them. As she battles her emotions and the pressures of life, she is forced to fight even harder to save her own life.

4.title: Kirsten's Story
4.plot: Weighing over 600 pounds, Kirsten is close to losing all her mobility. While she's trying to get control ofher obesity she's also in danger of losing her troubled son. Can Kristen lose the weight, regain her health,and learn to be a mother again?

5.title: Doug's Story
5.plot: After overcoming a dependence on drugs & alcohol, sneaking food is 660-lb Doug's last remaining vice. Can this husband, and father of 3 overcome his addictive personality and take control of his eating habits in order to save his life and his marriage?

6.title: Erica's Story
6.plot: At 661 lbs, Erica regrets not keeping a promise to her mom. She hopes her siblings will help but they are reluctant based on her past failures. Each meal threatens Erica's worst fear coming true; dying the same way she lives, alone and surrounded by food.

7.title: Diana's Story
7.plot: Diana, a once thin and active woman, is now a prisoner to her 620lb body. Desperate to break free of her food addiction, she trades the comfort of her apartment for a weight loss journey under the strict authority of her niece in order to regain her life.

8.title: Michael's Story
8.plot: Michael's massive 632lb body has left this husband and father dependent upon his family. If he doesn't learn to control his anger issues around food, lose weight, and address the root of his issues, then he will remain in jeopardy of losing everything.

9.title: Nicole's Story
9.plot: Weighing over 700-lbs, Nicole is on the verge of leaving her two young children motherless. Trying to survive a family of addicts, she commits to Dr Nowzaradan's diet program, but crisis threatens to derail all her hopes for weight-loss.

10.title: Tanisha's Story
10.plot: Tanisha weighs around 600-lbs and she's desperate to survive for her kids and avoid her mother's tragic fate of dying at age 50 from super obesity. Now at 32, her future looks grim if she doesn't make a drastic change to save her life.

11.title: James K's Story
11.plot: Weighing 791-lbs, James is bedridden, unable to stand, and can barely move his legs. He may only have a few months to live, so his family takes a high-risk journey to Houston, TX with the hope that bypass surgery can save his life.

12.title: Tracey's Story
12.plot: Most of the extreme weight on Tracey's body resides in her shockingly misshapen legs. They're so massive with severe lymphedema, that gastric surgery is her only chance of survival. Will this mother and grandmother ever gain control of her overeating?

13.title: Steven and Justin's Story Part 1
13.plot: Steven Assanti weighs nearly 800-lbs and his brother/nemesis, Justin, is almost 600-lbs. Though the brothers can't stand each other, their father packs up the family to travel across the country to seek help, desperate to save both his sons' lives.

14.title: Steven and Justin's Story Part 2
14.plot: After a year on a weight loss program, Steven remains completely non-compliant, and Justin focuses on a new career instead of his diet... With neither brother close to being approved for life-saving surgery, time is quickly running out for the brothers.

15.title: Lupe & Ashley D.
15.plot: Dr. Nowzaradan is worried Lupe's emotional issues are blocking her weight loss journey since she's shed over 300-lbs but still can't walk... And when Ashley is struck with sudden paralysis, her own emotional stability is thrown into peril.

16.title: Brittani & Sean
16.plot: Gastric surgery freed Brittani from her housebound life, but to achieve her ideal body she'll have to endure two more painful surgeries. Sean's super-obesity nearly killed him... Will he finally make a break from his mother's over-protective care?

17.title: Teretha & Chad
17.plot: Surgery enables Teretha to return to family in Detroit, but it soon threatens to undo all her progress. Trucker Chad is back on the road, but his old diet is a risk.

18.title: Nikki
18.plot: After losing 250lbs, Nikki is on her way to skin surgery that will transform her body. But when a close friend dies from weight loss surgery, Nikki's progress goes off track, derailed by fears of another surgery and if she'll make it out alive.

19.title: Dottie & June
19.plot: Devastated by the sudden loss of her son, Dottie's weight loss journey is in danger of going off track. June embarks on a plan to win approval for skin surgery. And Melissa, Jessica and Matt prepare for skin removal surgery.

20.title: Mila & Charity
20.plot: Charity's daughter becomes dangerously obese; devastated by the death of her husband, Elroy, Milla must find a way to finally qualify for gastric bypass; checking in with individuals who underwent skin removal surgery.

21.title: Joe W. & Pauline
21.plot: Joe was once 800lbs, housebound and alone. Now engaged, can he continue his weight loss? Pauline is on the verge of independence if only she can qualify for the skin surgery she needs so badly.

22.title: Laura & Chay
22.plot: Surgery enabled Laura's independence but the complications nearly killed her and she's terrified about the next skin surgery. Chay revealed to her family she was transgender but living life as an overweight woman; can she stick to her weight loss journey?

1.title: Rena & Lee's Story
1.plot: After meeting and falling in love at a barriatric rehab center, Lee and Rena are battling health and anger issues while taking a desperate, second attempt to save their relationship and their lives.

2.title: Janine's Story
2.plot: A woman whose extreme obesity has left her nearly immobile must overcome both her physical and emotional pain if she is ever to live a normal life again.

3.title: Alicia's Story
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Liz's Story
4.plot: Liz is completely bed bound with severe lymphedema that makes it impossible to walk. Utterly isolated, with no friends, she battles depression, and lives with her mom who is too ill to take care of her. Liz desperately wants to become mobile.

5.title: Karina's Story
5.plot: Unable to stand for more than a short period of time, Karina's weight has placed a burden on her parents and driven a wedge between she and her sister. Can Karina lose weight and repair the damage to her family?

6.title: James B.'s Story
6.plot: James "LB" Bonner spent his early life trying to prove himself to his adoptive family, but after losing a leg and battling obesity, LB must take a new path to save his health and his family relationships.

7.title: Lisa's Story
7.plot: Lisa's struggle with her weight began as a child and significantly worsened after witnessing her brother's murder. Now bedridden and unable to care for herself, Lisa must find a way to lose the weight or she will never see her grandchildren grow up.

8.title: Robert's Story
8.plot: With the support of his fiance, Kathryn, Robert turns to Dr. Nowzaradan in a final, desperate attempt to save his life. He tries to reverse a lifelong food addiction that has left him bed-bound, saddled with grotesque lymphedema, and nearly 900-lbs.

9.title: Tammy Lynn's Story
9.plot: After years of a tumultuous relationship with her husband, Tamy's eating addiction has caused her weight to balloon over 500-lbs. She has become a hermit after years of shame, and hopes to restart her life so she can better care for her son Zachary.

10.title: Benji & David's Story
10.plot: Fearing he'll suffer the same fate as 700-pound brother David, Benji hopes to be able to support both himself and his brother on their life-or-death weight loss journey.

11.title: Renee's Story
11.plot: A former plus-size model and "big is beautiful" advocate, Renee now realizes the mortal mistakes she has made as her weight swells to 600-lbs and her health crumbles.

12.title: Sarah's Story
12.plot: After a difficult childhood with an abusive stepfather and drug-addicted mother, Sarah weighs over 600-lbs and is fighting for her life at only 24 years old.

13.title: Schenee's Story
13.plot: Devastated by two miscarriages due to her weight, Schenee is desperate to start a family and stop relying on her husband, Freddie, to take care of her. Will weight loss surgery be able to fix her fertility issues as well as her marriage?

14.title: Jennifer & Marissa's Story
14.plot: Jennifer and her daughter Marissa are stuck in a codependent relationship that has put both of their lives in jeopardy, with a combined weight of over 900-lbs. Can Jennifer regain control and save both of their lives before it's too late?

15.title: One Ton Family: Part 1
15.plot: After a lifelong struggle with obesity, the three Perrio siblings travel to Houston in a last-chance journey to lose weight. Will they be able to break decades of unhealthy habits without fracturing as a family?

16.title: One Ton Family: Part 2
16.plot: With the Perrios struggling with different stages of their weight loss journey, the revelation of a past tragedy explains their resistance to recovery. The siblings must now come together to overcome their fears and forge a path towards a healthy future.

imdb.title: My 600-lb Life
plot: Men and women, all of whom weigh at least 600 pounds, undergo gastric-bypass surgery. The series follows the changes in their weight and in their lives over a year.::Morganalee
